job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Learning workflows and most of the infrastructure. This team is tasked with enabling the success of and synergies between the application teams.
          + Maintain and extend our search back-end.
          + Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results.
          + Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming
          + The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.
          + Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search).
          + Build RAG solutions for editorial domain

   Technologies
          + AWS, Kafka, Elasticsearch, Python (FastAPI), SQL, Docker
          + Nice to have: vector databases, semantic search
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer

Learning workflows and most of the infrastructure. This team is tasked with enabling the success of and synergies between the application teams.
          + Maintain and extend our search back-end.
          + Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results.
          + Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming
          + The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.
          + Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search).
          + Build RAG solutions for editorial domain

   Technologies
          + AWS, Kafka, Elasticsearch, Python (FastAPI), SQL, Docker
          + Nice to have: vector databases, semantic search

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building RAG solutions, keeping up with developments in semantic search, and mentions vector databases as a 'nice to have'. While it includes software development and MLOps tasks, the core focus on generative AI applications (RAG) and related technologies like semantic search and vector databases strongly aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Maintain and extend our search back-end', 'Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests', and 'Build RAG solutions for editorial domain', which are all core software development activities related to building and improving applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Maintain and extend our search back-end

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results', which involves designing and implementing experiments within a software system.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, run and evaluate online AB-tests to improve the quality of the search results

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming' and 'The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.', which are key aspects of operational excellence and site reliability.
job_tasks.phrase: Support operational excellence through practices like code review and pair programming

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly states 'The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.', which directly relates to managing and maintaining production services.
job_tasks.phrase: The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services. This includes actively monitoring different applications and their infrastructure as well as intervening to solve operational problems whenever they arise.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build RAG solutions for editorial domain' indicates the development and implementation of generative AI models, specifically Retrieval-Augmented Generation systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Build RAG solutions for editorial domain

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search)' suggests a need to understand and potentially implement advanced modeling techniques related to search and information retrieval.
job_tasks.phrase: Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search)

soft_skills.phrase: Keep up with developments in the field of Information Retrieval (e.g. semantic search)
The entire team is responsible for the operations of our services.
